title: MPCS Career Outcomes 2022-23
content: Skip to content About Why UChicago CS Defining and building the future of computer science, from theory to applications and from science to society. Our Building A state-of-the-art research and teaching facility. Giving & Collaboration Job Openings Visiting UChicago CS Research Highlights Quantum Computing The new paradigm of computing, harnessing quantum physics. Data Science Defining this emerging field by advancing foundations and applications. Research Areas AI & Machine Learning Computing Education Data & Databases Human Computer Interaction Scientific & High Performance Computing Security & Privacy Programming Languages Systems, Architecture & Networking Theory Visual Computing Labs & Groups Faculty-led research groups exploring research areas within computer science and its interdisciplinary applications. Partners Organizations from academia, industry, government, and the non-profit sector that collaborate with UChicago CS. Postdoctoral Researchers Opportunities for PhDs to work on world-class computer science research with faculty members. Academics / Masters Programs MPCS Career Outcomes 2022-23 The MPCS gathers our Alumni Career Outcomes information by sending graduate student surveys to our students after they graduate from their program. MPCS By the Numbers 22-23 “MPCS gives me in-depth CS knowledge. Originally from Civil Engineering background, I became well-equipped with programming skills and CS background knowledge needed to transfer to my new career after graduating from MPCS program.” —Siqi Li, 2023 MPCS Graduate Putting MPCS Alumni on the Map MPCS AY 22-23 Average Graduate Salary by Position MPCS AY 22-23 Graduate Positions & Industries The MPCS is good at balancing sufficiently deep dives into theory with application. I received ample teaching into theory and got to develop plenty of larger scale applications.”—Austin Clark, 2023 MPCS Graduate MPCS Alumni Employers TECHNOLOGY CONSULTING FINANCE/TRADING Ab Initio Accenture Akuna Capital Adobe Bain & Company American Express Alibaba Group Boston Consulting Group Bank of America Amazon (AWS) Cognizant Barclays Investment Bank Anixter Deloitte Consulting Belvedere Trading AppFolio IGPI (Industrial Growth Platform Inc) BlackEdge Capital Apple KPMG Bloomberg Audible McKinsey & Company Boerboel Trading Beats Health Pariveda Solutions Capital One Blend360 PWC Chicago Trading Bose Corporation SapientRazorfish Company Braintree Slalom Citadel Investment Bytedance ST Engineering iDirect Group Carevoyance Software Teragonia Citi Bank Cimon VestHQ Credit Suisse Cisco DRW Trading Citrix Systems GOVERNMENT Federal Reserve Bank Code.org Department of Defense GCM Grosvenor Coforma.io Northrop Grumman Global Atlantic Collective Health Goldman Sachs ConnectSx RETAIL Harvest Investments CrowdStrike CVS Hughes & Company DoorDash General Motors Huobi Exelon Mitsubshi IMC Financial Markets Expedia New York Yankees Interactive Brokers Foursquare Nike JPMorgan Chase GitHub Red Bull Jump Trading Google The Field Museum of Natural History LaSalle Trading Group GroundTruth Toyota Motor Meta Trading Groupon Corporation Morgan Stanley Hunt Club Verizon Morningstar, Inc.
